Subject: Residence Visa Expiry Notification
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://performancemanager5.successfactors.eu/companyLogoServlet/?companyId=Chalhoub> 	
Hello GHAZARIAN Hagop, 

Your Residence Visa will expire in 90 days, we are going to start your renewal process 3 months prior expiry, if you have plans to travel and you wish to proceed with the renewal early Please contact your HR team to discuss the renewal process. 

Important Note: please make sure you passport is valid for more than 6 months upon renewal. 

Supporting you all the way through 

Your HR Team
